Version 7.5.1:
-Game stability improvements
-Technical enhancements

Version 7.5 is here! Before rolling out the hugely-anticipated Survival Arena update, we want to get everything ready for our fans. Enter UPDATE OVERDRIVE™ and behold:
<

Version 7.6 is here! We’ve made some changes and improvements, check out the new features below:

* Inventory Update - No more headaches with overloaded troop camps! We’ve added a Troops tab in the inventory that stores all your excess warriors. Tra

Are you ready to celebrate St. Patrick’s Day with us?

-Prepare to brawl with the Leprechaun King, but be ready for anything: this fellow is as mad as a March hare! Cure his green-and-gold madness and claim the Leprechaun's Pot o' Gold!

Boom! Version 7.7.0 Is Live! Here are all the improvements you can expect:

* Squad Bar - Squad bar received a slight overhaul, it is now more compact and allows for easier management of your army.
* Event Preview - Just how much action does Clou

Update 7.8.0 codenamed Belt'n'Raid has landed! Check it out:

· Battle Belt for your top 4 items used in raids. We felt that taking a ton of consumables into battle wasn't right, so now you'll have to make an informed decision of picking your favori

- Turkinator is here! - Battle the Leftover Legion, lead by the mighty Turkinator! His ferocious flock will leave your base in ruins!
- Thanksgiving Chest - Available for a limited time, claim the offer of a lifetime with unique never before seen item
